targets.query:
from(bucket: "something")
  |> range(start: -7d) 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with  _value: 1}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","vin","_value"]) 
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn:last, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["vin"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn:count, createEmpty: false)

timeFrom = today()
crash = from(bucket: "something")
  |> range(start: timeFrom)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["capability"] == "crash" and r.property =="incidents")  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","vin"])
  |> unique(column: "_time")
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: count, createEmpty: false, column:"vin")


theftAlarm = from(bucket: "something")
  |> range(start: timeFrom)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["capability"] == "thief_alarm" and r.property =="status") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == "triggered") 
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","vin"])
  |> unique(column: "_time")
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: count, createEmpty: false, column:"vin")



diagnostics = from(bucket: "something")
  |> range(start: timeFrom)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["capability"] == "diagnostics" and r.property =="engine_time_to_next_service") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r._field == "diagnostics_engine_time_to_next_service_hours" and r._value <= 0)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","vin"])
  |> unique(column: "_time")
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: count, createEmpty: false, column:"vin")



union(tables: [crash, theftAlarm, diagnostics])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: last, createEmpty: false, column:"vin")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: sum, createEmpty: true, column:"vin")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with vin: if exists r.vin then r.vin else 0 }))
  |> yield(name: "end")

startTime = today()
from(bucket: "something")
  |> range(start: startTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["capability"] == "maintenance" and r._field == "time_to_next_service_days" and r._value <= 1 ) 
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","vin"])
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: count, createEmpty: false, column:"vin")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: count, createEmpty: true, column:"vin")
  |> yield(name: "servicesToday")

import "influxdata/influxdb"
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
import "experimental"
import "date"
import "dict"
import "generate"
weekDay = [0: "Sunday", 1: "Monday", 2: "Tuesday", 3: "Wednesday", 4: "Thursday", 5: "Friday", 6: "Saturday"]

weekStartDate = () =>  {
  weekDays = [0: 6, 1: 1, 2: 1, 3: 2, 4: 3, 5: 4, 6: 5]
  daysDuration = dict.get(dict: weekDays, key: date.weekDay(t: today()), default: 0)*24*60*60*1000000000
  timeToReturn = date.truncate(t: experimental.subDuration(d: duration(v: uint(v: daysDuration )), from: now()), unit: 1d)
  return timeToReturn
}

serviceDate = (eventDate,daysCount) =>  {
  durationTime = duration(v: int(v: daysCount)*24*60*60*1000000000)
  dateToReturn = date.truncate(t: experimental.addDuration(d: durationTime, to: eventDate), unit: 1d)
  return dateToReturn
}
  

data = from(bucket: "something")
  |> range(start: weekStartDate(), stop: experimental.addDuration(d: 6d23h59m59s, to:  weekStartDate()))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["capability"] == "maintenance") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "time_to_next_service_days") 
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with service_date: serviceDate(eventDate: r._time, daysCount: r._value)}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","vin","service_date"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["service_date"] >= weekStartDate() and  r["service_date"] < experimental.addDuration(d: 7d, to:  weekStartDate())) 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _time: r.service_date, day_id: date.weekDay(t: r.service_date), _value: r.vin}))
  |> last()
  |> group()

  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1ns, fn: count, createEmpty: false, column: "vin")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with tag: string(v: r.vin), _value: date.weekDay(t: r._time) , _time: date.truncate(t: r._time, unit: 1d)}))
  |> drop(columns:["_start","_stop"])


t1 = generate.from(count: 7, fn: (n) => n + 1 , start: weekStartDate(), stop: experimental.addDuration(d: 7d, to:  weekStartDate()))
    |> set(key: "tag", value: "0")
    |> group()
   

union(tables: [data, t1])
  |> drop(columns: ["vin"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1ns, fn: last, createEmpty: false, column: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: int(v: r.tag)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with day: dict.get(dict: weekDay, key: date.weekDay(t: r._time ) , default: "0")}))
  |> drop(columns:["_start","_stop","tag"])
  |> yield(name: "end")

crash = from(bucket: "something")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["capability"] == "crash" and r.property =="incidents"  and r["_time"] > today())  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s , fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","vin"])
  |> unique(column: "_time")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with xevent: "Crash Detected" , _value: r._time }))
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns:["_value"])
  |> group()

theftAlarm = from(bucket: "something")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["capability"] == "thief_alarm" and r.property =="status") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == "triggered") 
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","vin"])
  |> unique(column: "_time")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with xevent: "Theft Alarm"  , _value: r._time}))
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns:["_value"])
  |> group()


diagnostics = from(bucket: "something")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["capability"] == "diagnostics" and r.property =="engine_time_to_next_service") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r._field == "diagnostics_engine_time_to_next_service_hours" and r._value <= 0)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s , fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","vin"])
  |> unique(column: "_time")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with xevent: "Overdue Service"  , _value: r._time}))
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns:["_value"])
  |> group()


union(tables: [crash, theftAlarm, diagnostics])
  |> yield(name: "end")

import "experimental"
coordinates = from(bucket: "something")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["capability"] == "vehicle_location") 
  |> keep(columns: ["vehicle_location_coordinates_data_latitude","vin","vehicle_location_coordinates_data_longitude","_value","_field","_time"]) 
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["message_id"])
  |> group()


climate = from(bucket: "something")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["capability"] == "climate") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "climate_outside_temperature_celsius") 
  |> keep(columns: ["climate_outside_temperature_celsius","vin","_value","_field","_time"]) 
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group()



//experimental.join(left: coordinates, right: climate, fn: (left, right) => ({left with climate_outside_temperature_celsius: if exists right.climate_outside_temperature_celsius and right.vin == left.vin  then right.climate_outside_temperature_celsius else float(v: 999999) }))
experimental.join(left: coordinates, right: climate, fn: (left, right) => ({left with climate_outside_temperature_celsius: if exists right.climate_outside_temperature_celsius   then right.climate_outside_temperature_celsius else float(v: 999999) }))
  |> unique(column:"vin")

import "experimental"
import "date"

active = from(bucket: "something")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["property"] == "bulb_failures" or r["property"] == "dashboard_lights" and r._value == "on" or  r["property"] == "trouble_codes" and r["capability"] == "diagnostics" ) 
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","vin"])
  |> unique(column: "vin")  
  |> group()
  |> count(column: "vin")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _time: now()}))
  |> group() 

devices = from(bucket: "something")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer") 
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","vin"])
  |> unique(column: "vin")
  |> group() 
  |> count(column: "vin")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _time: now()}))
  |> group() 

experimental.join(left: active, right: devices, fn: (left, right) => ({left with current: left.vin, max: right.vin, min: 0 }))

from(bucket: "something")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["property"] == "bulb_failures" or r["property"] == "dashboard_lights" and r._value == "on"  ) 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","vin","_value"])
  |> unique(column: "vin") 
  |> drop(columns: ["vin"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: count, createEmpty:  true)

from(bucket: "something")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["property"] == "trouble_codes" ) 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","vin","_value"])
  |> unique(column: "vin") 
  |> drop(columns: ["vin"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod , fn: count, createEmpty:  true)

startTime = today()
from(bucket: "something")
  |> range(start: startTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["capability"] == "maintenance" and r._field == "time_to_next_service_days" and r._value <= 1 ) 
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","vin"])
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: count, createEmpty: false, column:"vin")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: count, createEmpty: true, column:"vin")
  |> yield(name: "servicesToday")

import "influxdata/influxdb"
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
import "experimental"
import "date"
import "dict"
import "generate"

timenow = now()
weekStartDate = (weekDate) =>  {
  weekDays = [0: 6, 1: 1, 2: 1, 3: 2, 4: 3, 5: 4, 6: 5]
  daysDuration = dict.get(dict: weekDays, key: date.weekDay(t: weekDate), default: 0)*24*60*60*1000000000
  timeToReturn = date.truncate(t: experimental.subDuration(d: duration(v: uint(v: daysDuration )), from: weekDate), unit: 1d)
  return timeToReturn
}

serviceDate = (eventDate,daysCount) =>  {
  durationTime = duration(v: int(v: daysCount)*24*60*60*1000000000)
  dateToReturn = date.truncate(t: experimental.addDuration(d: durationTime, to: eventDate), unit: 1d)
  return dateToReturn
}
  

data = from(bucket: "something")
  |> range(start: weekStartDate(weekDate: timenow), stop: experimental.addDuration(d: 7w23h59m59s, to:  weekStartDate(weekDate: timenow)))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["capability"] == "maintenance") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "time_to_next_service_days") 
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1w, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with service_date: serviceDate(eventDate: r._time, daysCount: r._value)}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","vin","service_date"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["service_date"] >= weekStartDate(weekDate: timenow) and  r["service_date"] < experimental.addDuration(d: 7w, to:  weekStartDate(weekDate: timenow))) 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _time: weekStartDate(weekDate: r.service_date), _value: r.vin}))
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1ns, fn: count, createEmpty: false, column: "vin")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with tag: string(v: r.vin), _value: date.week(t: r._time) , _time: date.truncate(t: r._time, unit: 1d), week:"CW"+string(v: date.week(t: r._time))}))
  |> drop(columns:["_start","_stop"])

  
t1 = generate.from(count: 7, fn: (n) => n + 1 , start: weekStartDate(weekDate: timenow), stop: experimental.addDuration(d: 7w, to:  weekStartDate(weekDate:timenow)))
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with week:  "CW"+string(v: date.week(t: r._time)), _value: date.week(t: r._time)}))
    |> group()
   

union(tables: [data, t1])  
  |> drop(columns: ["vin"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1ns, fn: last, createEmpty: false, column: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if  r.tag == "" then 0 else int(v: r.tag)}))
  |> drop(columns:["_start","_stop","tag"])

import "influxdata/influxdb"
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
import "experimental"
import "date"
import "dict"
import "generate"

timenow = now()

weekStartDate = (weekDate) =>  {
  weekDays = [0: 6, 1: 1, 2: 1, 3: 2, 4: 3, 5: 4, 6: 5]
  daysDuration = dict.get(dict: weekDays, key: date.weekDay(t: weekDate), default: 0)*24*60*60*1000000000
  timeToReturn = date.truncate(t: experimental.subDuration(d: duration(v: uint(v: daysDuration )), from: weekDate), unit: 1d)
  return timeToReturn
}

data = from(bucket: "something")
  |> range(start: -7d, stop: experimental.addDuration(d: 7w, to:  weekStartDate(weekDate: timenow)))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["property"] == "next_inspection_date")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "maintenance_next_inspection_date_data")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1w, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with service_date: time(v: r._value)}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","vin","service_date"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["service_date"] >= weekStartDate(weekDate: timenow) and  r["service_date"] < experimental.addDuration(d: 7w, to:  weekStartDate(weekDate: timenow))) 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _time: weekStartDate(weekDate: r.service_date), _value: r.vin}))
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1ns, fn: count, createEmpty: false, column: "vin")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with tag: string(v: r.vin), _value: date.week(t: r._time) , _time: date.truncate(t: r._time, unit: 1d), week:"CW"+string(v: date.week(t: r._time))}))
  |> drop(columns:["_start","_stop"])


t1 = generate.from(count: 7, fn: (n) => n + 1 , start: weekStartDate(weekDate: timenow), stop: experimental.addDuration(d: 7w, to:  weekStartDate(weekDate:timenow)))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with week:  "CW"+string(v: date.week(t: r._time)), _value: date.week(t: r._time)}))
  |> group()
   

union(tables: [data, t1])  
  |> drop(columns: ["vin"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1ns, fn: last, createEmpty: false, column: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if  r.tag == "" then 0 else int(v: r.tag)}))
  |> drop(columns:["_start","_stop","tag"])

import "influxdata/influxdb"
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
import "experimental"
import "date"
import "dict"
import "generate"

timenow = now()
weekStartDate = (weekDate) =>  {
  weekDays = [0: 6, 1: 1, 2: 1, 3: 2, 4: 3, 5: 4, 6: 5]
  daysDuration = dict.get(dict: weekDays, key: date.weekDay(t: weekDate), default: 0)*24*60*60*1000000000
  timeToReturn = date.truncate(t: experimental.subDuration(d: duration(v: uint(v: daysDuration )), from: weekDate), unit: 1d)
  return timeToReturn
}

serviceDate = (eventDate,daysCount) =>  {
  durationTime = duration(v: int(v: daysCount)*24*60*60*1000000000)
  dateToReturn = date.truncate(t: experimental.addDuration(d: durationTime, to: eventDate), unit: 1d)
  return dateToReturn
}
  

data = from(bucket: "something")
  |> range(start: -7d, stop: experimental.addDuration(d: 7w, to:  weekStartDate(weekDate: timenow)))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["capability"] == "maintenance") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "maintenance_time_to_next_oil_service_days")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with service_date: serviceDate(eventDate: r._time, daysCount: r._value)}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)  
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","vin","service_date"])   
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["service_date"] >= weekStartDate(weekDate: timenow) and  r["service_date"] < experimental.addDuration(d: 7w, to:  weekStartDate(weekDate: timenow))) 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _time: weekStartDate(weekDate: r.service_date), _value: r.vin}))
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1ns, fn: count, createEmpty: false, column: "vin")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with tag: string(v: r.vin), _value: date.week(t: r._time) , _time: date.truncate(t: r._time, unit: 1d), week:"CW"+string(v: date.week(t: r._time))}))
  |> drop(columns:["_start","_stop"])



   
t1 = generate.from(count: 7, fn: (n) => n + 1 , start: weekStartDate(weekDate: timenow), stop: experimental.addDuration(d:7w, to:  weekStartDate(weekDate:timenow)))
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with week:  "CW"+string(v: date.week(t: r._time)), _value: date.week(t: r._time)}))
    |> group()

union(tables: [data, t1])  
  |> drop(columns: ["vin"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1ns, fn: last, createEmpty: false, column: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if  r.tag == "" then 0 else int(v: r.tag)}))
  |> drop(columns:["_start","_stop","tag"])
